attribute.value: Hello! I'm here to assist you with any customer service inquiries you may have. Whether you need information about our products, services, or policies, or if you need help resolving an issue or completing a transaction, feel free to ask. How can I assist you today?

attribute.task: Provide detailed information about product specifications and features
Assist in scheduling product demonstrations or virtual tours
Provide assistance and updates on delivery status
Facilitate and manage inquiries about rental services for robots
Address technical support questions and troubleshoot robot issues
Offer information regarding company innovations like the robot milk tea shop
Guide users in customizing and configuring robots for business requirements

attribute.value: Execute: Execute Provide detailed information about product specifications and features
Greet the user and ask if they are interested in scheduling a product demonstration or virtual tour.
Use RAGWorker to provide information about the available product demonstrations or virtual tours, such as options, formats, and times.
Ask the user for their preferred date and time for the demonstration or tour.
Confirm the user's preferred schedule and check the availability using predefined responses with MessageWorker.
If the preferred slot is available, confirm the booking and provide any preparation details. If not, offer alternative dates and times.
Ask if there is anything else the user needs help with or any other questions they may have.
Greet the user and ask for their order number or any relevant information to track their delivery.
Use the RAGWorker to look up the delivery status of the order from the company's internal documentation and provide the user with the current status.
Ask the user if they have any further questions or need more details about the delivery process or policies.
Provide additional information or clarification using the RAGWorker as needed, and offer ways to resolve any concerns regarding the delivery.
Confirm if the user is satisfied with the information provided and offer further assistance if needed.
Execute: Execute Facilitate and manage inquiries about rental services for robots
Initiate the conversation by asking the user to describe the technical issue or question they have about the robot.
Use the RAGWorker to access the company's internal documentation and provide a response based on the user's described issue using relevant FAQs, product information, or support guides.
Check if the provided solution resolved the user's issue or if they need further assistance.
If further assistance is needed, ask follow-up questions to gather more details about the issue for more specific troubleshooting.
Provide additional troubleshooting steps or escalate the issue to a human agent if it cannot be resolved using predefined responses and internal documentation.
Execute: Execute Offer information regarding company innovations like the robot milk tea shop
Ask the user about the specific business requirements they have for customizing or configuring the robot.
Retrieve detailed information and guidance on customization and configuration options based on the company's internal documentation.
Provide the user with options or recommendations based on their specified business requirements and the gathered information.
Inquire if the user needs further assistance or if they have additional questions regarding the customization or configuration process.
Offer to connect the user with a human specialist or provide additional documentation if the user's requirements are complex or outside the scope of the chatbot.

edges.intent: User inquires about provide detailed information about product specifications and features
User inquires about assist in scheduling product demonstrations or virtual tours
User inquires about provide assistance and updates on delivery status
User inquires about facilitate and manage inquiries about rental services for robots
User inquires about address technical support questions and troubleshoot robot issues
User inquires about offer information regarding company innovations like the robot milk tea shop
User inquires about guide users in customizing and configuring robots for business requirements

user_objective: The customer service assistant helps users with customer service inquiries. It can provide information about products, services, and policies, as well as help users resolve issues and complete transactions.
builder_objective: The customer service assistant helps to request customer's contact information.
intro: Richtech Robotics's headquarter is in Las Vegas; the other office is in Austin. Richtech Robotics provide worker robots (ADAM, ARM, ACE), delivery robots (Matradee, Matradee X, Matradee L, Richie), cleaning robots (DUST-E SX, DUST-E MX) and multipurpose robots (skylark). Their products are intended for business purposes, but not for home purpose; the ADAM robot is available for purchase and rental for multiple purposes. This robot bartender makes tea, coffee and cocktails. Richtech Robotics also operate the world's first robot milk tea shop, ClouTea, in Las Vegas (www.cloutea.com), where all milk tea beverages are prepared by the ADAM robot. The delivery time will be one month for the delivery robot, 2 weeks for standard ADAM, and two months for commercial cleaning robot.

tasks.name: Provide detailed information about product specifications and features

steps.description: Execute: Execute Provide detailed information about product specifications and features

tasks.name: Assist in scheduling product demonstrations or virtual tours

steps.description: Greet the user and ask if they are interested in scheduling a product demonstration or virtual tour.
Use RAGWorker to provide information about the available product demonstrations or virtual tours, such as options, formats, and times.
Ask the user for their preferred date and time for the demonstration or tour.
Confirm the user's preferred schedule and check the availability using predefined responses with MessageWorker.
If the preferred slot is available, confirm the booking and provide any preparation details. If not, offer alternative dates and times.
Ask if there is anything else the user needs help with or any other questions they may have.

tasks.name: Provide assistance and updates on delivery status

steps.description: Greet the user and ask for their order number or any relevant information to track their delivery.
Use the RAGWorker to look up the delivery status of the order from the company's internal documentation and provide the user with the current status.
Ask the user if they have any further questions or need more details about the delivery process or policies.
Provide additional information or clarification using the RAGWorker as needed, and offer ways to resolve any concerns regarding the delivery.
Confirm if the user is satisfied with the information provided and offer further assistance if needed.

tasks.name: Facilitate and manage inquiries about rental services for robots

steps.description: Execute: Execute Facilitate and manage inquiries about rental services for robots

tasks.name: Address technical support questions and troubleshoot robot issues

steps.description: Initiate the conversation by asking the user to describe the technical issue or question they have about the robot.
Use the RAGWorker to access the company's internal documentation and provide a response based on the user's described issue using relevant FAQs, product information, or support guides.
Check if the provided solution resolved the user's issue or if they need further assistance.
If further assistance is needed, ask follow-up questions to gather more details about the issue for more specific troubleshooting.
Provide additional troubleshooting steps or escalate the issue to a human agent if it cannot be resolved using predefined responses and internal documentation.

tasks.name: Offer information regarding company innovations like the robot milk tea shop

steps.description: Execute: Execute Offer information regarding company innovations like the robot milk tea shop

tasks.name: Guide users in customizing and configuring robots for business requirements

steps.description: Ask the user about the specific business requirements they have for customizing or configuring the robot.
Retrieve detailed information and guidance on customization and configuration options based on the company's internal documentation.
Provide the user with options or recommendations based on their specified business requirements and the gathered information.
Inquire if the user needs further assistance or if they have additional questions regarding the customization or configuration process.
Offer to connect the user with a human specialist or provide additional documentation if the user's requirements are complex or outside the scope of the chatbot.
